author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-3065, SOLR-2497: When a NumericField is retrieved from a Document loaded from IndexReader (or IndexSearcher), it will now come back as NumericField. Solr now uses NumericField solely (no more magic).

author: ito
msg: CLEREZZA-501: reindex thread improved and indexing urirefs implemented

author: norman
msg: Make sure the CLRF get written after the last char at all cases. This hopefully fix JAMES-1222

author: antelder
msg: Update to use the factory to create the endpoint registry

author: mgrigorov
msg: WICKET-3667 Once in a while we get random page expired on customers site
Apparently the page instance is stored in session/disk for Ajax requests even in Wicket 1.4.x.
